title: Fovno Electric Sucker roof rack suctions to your car at the press of a button
content:
After apparently not liking the tiny manual pump on Sea Suckerâ€™s suction cup roof racks, Fovno decided to add an electric pump and CNC their own three-bike roof rack. The Fovno N-Power Electric Sucker uses a small, rechargeable compressor to create suction inside six individual cups, three for the fork mount front rack, and three

The post Fovno Electric Sucker roof rack suctions to your car at the press of a button appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
